name: Opening Hours
content:
Ecobuild takes place on Tuesday 5 - Thursday 7 March 2013.

Opening hours:

Tuesday 5 March 10.00 - 17.00
Wednesday 6 March 10.00 - 18.00
Thursday 7 March 10.00 - 16.00

Get a head start! ExCeL's central boulevard, with its many cafes, is open from 08.00 each day - perfect for breakfast meetings, or to pause and plan your day at Ecobuild.
